mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.return_code AS "returnCode", a.return_msg AS "returnMsg", a.result_code AS "resultCode", a.err_code AS "errCode", a.err_code_des AS "errCodeDes", a.appid AS "appid", a.mch_id AS "mchId", a.nonce_str AS "nonceStr", a.sign AS "sign", a.transaction_id AS "transactionId", a.out_trade_no AS "outTradeNo", a.out_refund_no AS "outRefundNo", a.refund_id AS "refundId", a.refund_fee AS "refundFee", a.settlement_refund_fee AS "settlementRefundFee", a.total_fee AS "totalFee", a.fee_type AS "feeType", a.settlement_total_fee AS "settlementTotalFee", a.cash_fee AS "cashFee", a.cash_fee_type AS "cashFeeType", a.cash_refund_fee AS "cashRefundFee", a.coupon_refund_fee AS "couponRefundFee", a.coupon_refund_count AS "couponRefundCount", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM order_weixin_return_result a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM order_weixin_return_result a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_weixin_return_result( id, return_code, return_msg, result_code, err_code, err_code_des, appid, mch_id, nonce_str, sign, transaction_id, out_trade_no, out_refund_no, refund_id, refund_fee, settlement_refund_fee, total_fee, fee_type, settlement_total_fee, cash_fee, cash_fee_type, cash_refund_fee, coupon_refund_fee, coupon_refund_count, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{returnCode}, #{returnMsg}, #{resultCode}, #{errCode}, #{errCodeDes}, #{appid}, #{mchId}, #{nonceStr}, #{sign}, #{transactionId}, #{outTradeNo}, #{outRefundNo}, #{refundId}, #{refundFee}, #{settlementRefundFee}, #{totalFee}, #{feeType}, #{settlementTotalFee}, #{cashFee}, #{cashFeeType}, #{cashRefundFee}, #{couponRefundFee}, #{couponRefundCount}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_weixin_return_result SET return_code = #{returnCode}, return_msg = #{returnMsg}, result_code = #{resultCode}, err_code = #{errCode}, err_code_des = #{errCodeDes}, appid = #{appid}, mch_id = #{mchId}, nonce_str = #{nonceStr}, sign = #{sign}, transaction_id = #{transactionId}, out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo}, out_refund_no = #{outRefundNo}, refund_id = #{refundId}, refund_fee = #{refundFee}, settlement_refund_fee = #{settlementRefundFee}, total_fee = #{totalFee}, fee_type = #{feeType}, settlement_total_fee = #{settlementTotalFee}, cash_fee = #{cashFee}, cash_fee_type = #{cashFeeType}, cash_refund_fee = #{cashRefundFee}, coupon_refund_fee = #{couponRefundFee}, coupon_refund_count = #{couponRefundCount}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
